description: Awaken from an abandoned stasis pod and discover a doomed mining camp on Titan in an uncompromising turn-based survival RPG. Survive the evolving horrors that lurk below and craft equipment, research new gear, fight against overwhelming odds, or even discover your true fate.

name: Dune: Imperium - Rise of Ix
subName: Portable V2.0.0.872 + Build 15214489 + DLC Included & Online Supported
description: The award-winning board game of strategy and intrigue in the iconic universe of Dune. The Spice must flow.

name: Left Behind
description: LEFT BEHIND is a hyper-realistic psychological horror game where you take on the role of a real estate agent with a client looking to sell you a property. Instead of a straightforward and quick interaction with the client, you find yourself thrust into a deeply unsettling and frightening situation.

name: My Forged Wedding
description: "Marry me... Only a month would do." Due to a twist of fate, you're now pretending to be the wife of a man you've just met. At first, you're against the idea of this fake marriage, but as the days go on and you get to know one another, your mutual attraction deepens..

name: Death Trick: Double Blind
description: The star magician of Morgan’s Traveling Circus is missing, but the show must go on! In this non-linear detective visual novel, unravel the mystery from two different perspectives as you learn the varying stories of an entire circus of performers, each with their own lives... and their own secrets.

name: Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy
description: A game I made for a certain kind of person. To hurt them.

name: Space Reign
description: An indie space-sim and strategy game featuring ship and fleet combat mixed with management of a private space corporation. Claim sectors for your faction and raise its influence in the near-future, where resource exploiting corporations are in a state of constant conflict over territory control.

name: The Wandering Village: Trader & Poison
description: The Wandering Village is a city-building simulation game on the back of a giant, wandering creature. Build your settlement and form a symbiotic relationship with the colossus. Will you survive together in this hostile, yet beautiful post-apocalyptic world, contaminated by poisonous plants?

name: Rebel Transmute
description: Battle your way through a living planet in Rebel Transmute, a sprawling 2D action-exploration epic! Embody Moon Mikono as you explore, reprogram your abilities, duel twisted sci-fi experiments, rebel against colonizers, and search for your long lost mother.

name: Goblin Stone
description: Goblins have been hunted to extinction by cruel adventurers. Embark on a heartwarming roguelite adventure to rebuild their lair and help them thrive in this award-winning turn-based RPG where every decision counts.

name: Exanimum: The Silent Call
description: "Exanimum: The Silent Call" is a first-person psychological horror game. In this chilling experience, you will find yourself confronting terrifying mysteries and chilling secrets.

name: Death of a Wish
description: THE NEO-SANCTUM SHALL FALL. Claim retribution against the theocratic Faiths as you master vicious hack-and-slash combat in this action-RPG where style is salvation.

name: The Hong Kong Massacre
description: Blast your way through the streets of Hong Kong in a fast-paced, top-down shooter. Inspired by classic action movies, The Hong Kong Massacre places you at the center of a hard-boiled revenge story, filled with brutal, cinematic shootouts and vivid underworld locations.

name: EMPYRE: Earls of the Deep Earth
description: It’s the time before the Flood. The world is a strange place. Especially for you. How do you solve the mystery of your missing memory? Are you trapped? Can you leave? Ever? Enjoy a Neo-Victorian version of the Orient! Embark on a journey to explore a wondrous land filled with mystery and intrigue!

name: Contra: Operation Galuga
description: The legendary Contra series returns! This reimagining of the classic run-'n'-gun action game from the ‘80s features new stages, new enemies, new play mechanics, and co-op combat for up to 4 players!

name: Tales of Morrow
description: Create your tale! Build your home, fight, farm, and explore an old civilization while developing your skills and abilities in this relaxing and adventurous experience. You decide your fate!

name: Shadows of Forbidden Gods - The Horrors Beneath
description: Take on the role of a Dark Elder God and lead your agents to bring about an apocalypse in a fantasy world. Work in the shadows, avoiding the heroes who will try to stop you, as you bring about plague and famine, ice age and volcanic destruction, madness and never ending night.

name: A Twisted Tale
description: Discover a humouristic point and click adventure inspired by all the masterpieces which made us stick to our computers back in the day (and therefore we played outside way too infrequently).

name: SUMMERHOUSE
description: A tiny building game about beautiful lived-in houses. No rules or restrictions, just pure creativity.

name: Elder Legacy
description: Elder Legacy - This is a role-playing game. Embark on a soulful journey inspired by Boreyian myths and legends, filled with vibrant and unforgettable experiences. uncover the mystery behind the attempt to conquer the noble Boreyian people.
genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Early Access

name: Arranger: A Role-Puzzling Adventure
description: Find your way in a world of breezy, thoughtful puzzles, along a charming journey of self-discovery.

name: Abathor - Atlantis Bundle
description: Abathor is a 2D arcade action platformer for up to 4 players. You are the last hope in defense of Atlantis, you’ll face hordes of enemies and countless challenges. Enjoy its pixel art and epic music. A cooperative and competitive game to achieve glory or death.

name: Ova Magica
description: Stardew Valley meets Pokémon! Experience a wholesome JRPG-farm game inspired by the classics! Train cute blob creatures, take care of your farm and make friends with the people of Clover Town.
genres: Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Early Access

name: Le Mans Ultimate - 2024 Pack 1
description: Le Mans is a continually evolving story... powered by emotion, speed and glory. Le Mans Ultimate - the official game of the FIA World Endurance Championship and 24 Hours of Le Mans.

name: No Rest for the Wicked - The Crucible
description: From Moon Studios, the award-winning developers of Ori and the Blind Forest and Ori and the Will of the Wisps comes No Rest for the Wicked, a visceral, precision Action RPG set to reinvent the genre.

name: Old Coin Pusher Friends 3
description: In this installment, there is a Sugoroku themed around the old Japan, with various events triggered by the squares you land on. Work together with other players to defeat yokai, and aim for the jackpot. As you progress in the game, you can enhance your abilities with various upgrades.

name: Old School Rally
description: A nostalgic racing game that combines the charm of classic retro style visuals with the thrill of international rally competitions.

name: ExoCross
description: ExoCross is an offroad racing game introducing 4CPT vehicle physics (4-way contact patch traction technology). A soft-body tire model allows for competitive time attack and multiplayer wheel to wheel racing.

name: REYNATIS
description: Fantasy meets reality in Shibuya, Tokyo, where magic is something to be feared. In this action RPG, a young wizard seeks freedom through strength, and an officer seeks to control magic and restore order. When their paths cross, a darkness that will transform the world descends.

name: Abnormal1999:Sector 49
description: Abnormal1999: Sector 49 is a challenging mystery puzzle game. You play as Sam, searching for your daughter in the abandoned Sector 49. Collect 10 consciousnesses to open the portal and escape.

The protagonist is a lieutenant colonel, tasked with interrogating the suspect. The protagonist needs to find out why she killed the two men and how she committed the crime.

The protagonist is a lieutenant colonel, tasked with interrogating the suspect. The protagonist needs to find out why she killed the two men and how she committed the crime.

Become a master maze crafter. Collect bizarre artifacts. Rush creeps for lucrative rewards, and succumb to greed!

name: Ogu and the Secret Forest – Deluxe Edition
description: Explore the wonderful world with baby Ogu! 'Ogu and the Secret Forest' is a 2D adventure game with hand-drawn characters and various types of puzzles. Befriend bouncy characters and defeat strange creatures to unravel the mystery of the charming world.

description: "STRETCHER MEN" is an action game where you transport a patient on a stretcher. Control characters at the front and back, avoiding obstacles to safely reach the clinic. Simple yet deep gameplay tests your attention and coordination.

name: The Curse of Elmwood
description: You hear quiet whispers from deep inside the house, but no one sees. You begin to feel that you are not alone in this house. Curse of Elmwood is an atmospheric horror where you find yourself trapped in a gloomy 18th century mansion, steeped in mystery and horror.

name: Age of Defense
description: Age of Defense is a tower defense game full of mind-blowing mayhem. There are tons of monsters and tough defenders in the game each of which fits perfectly into a funny cartoonish setting.

description: In Zoo Simulator, your main task is to run and manage your own zoo. Renew it and take care of all the animals' needs, ensuring them a peaceful life! Will you attract crowds of visitors? Create your own zoo!

name: Astral Ascent - Yamat the Breach Traveler + OST + Artbook Bundle
description: Choose one of four heroes and explore the Garden, an astral prison guarded by 12 powerful mystical bosses: the Zodiacs. Challenge them with dozens of unique spells and faithful friends by your side to unfold the story of this platform roguelite with lightning fast combat.

name: Castle Guardian

description: Don the coat of a clever entrepreneur, take over a small railway company in the early 1800s and turn your steam engines into the workhorses of the economy. Grow your company into the largest railway company of the continent and outsmart your competitors.

In a society fully automated by advanced AI, you're ensnared within a foreign body, accompanied by its original owner's subconscious. Together, face impending challenges and confront an uncertain destiny.

name: You Suck at Parking® – Complete Edition + Original Soundtrack Bundle

name: Dread Weight

description: An intense, hardcore action side-scroller. Maneuver as a ninja killerbot through dynamic wastelands with 26+ specialized weapons. Dodge, dash, and dominate. name: BioGun
description: Get injected into the microscopic world of BioGun. Face viral threats and winding corridors on your mission to save man’s best friend from the inside. Will you be the vaccine to save dog-kind from extinction?

name: STAR WARS™: Bounty Hunter™
description: Bring In Your Bounty, Dead or Alive

name: Song Of The Prairie

Taking care fantastic animals. Dating with someone you like. Just enjoy the farming life only belongs to you!

name: Smack Studio
description: A sandbox fighting game with built-in creation tools to create characters and stages. Animate pixel art characters using our 3D pixel art rotation technology, then battle with up to 8 players! Use our tools to export sprites for your own projects.

name: Cozy Merge

Take on diverse gameplay challenges, manage and upgrade your resources and abilities while you unfold the mysteries of the Cosmos. Defeat LORD CHAOSBRINGER and earn your title as the MASTER BLASTER!

name: Mad Devils: Damned-finitive Edition

name: Blacklist Mafia
notes: How change language: You can change in the game settings.
description: Blacklist Mafia - is not only a struggle for power and money, but also a dangerous game of survival. Who will be blacklisted, and who will become the new boss? Find out with us!

name: OCTOPATH TRAVELER II
description: This game is a brand-new entry in the OCTOPATH TRAVELER series, the first installment of which was initially released in 2018 and sold over 3 million copies worldwide.

name: Tomba! - Special Edition -

name: hololive Treasure Mountain
description: Stack the Love of Captain Marin! A Simple yet Exciting 3D Physics Puzzle Game!

name: Amusement Park Simulator
description: This is a simulation-tycoon game for making your dream park.You can purchase , sell and move all of the machines and visual items.While you do these things costumers comes and experience all of this.Sometimes they wanna eat , watch and enjoy on machines.Becareful if they buy a ticket !

name: Summer Clover - Deluxe Edition
description: Experience a summer like never before as you become a live-in housekeeper for three charming sisters (and your supportive supervisor).

description: Help Leah overcome a serious illness caused by her cybernetic implants. In this a platformer from the creators of Aeterna Noctis, you will face hundreds of challenges and secrets that unravel the mystery of Eden Genesis. Live this Cyberpunk 2D adventure.

name: Fate/stay night REMASTERED
description: Seek the root of the Fate franchise. Return to where it all began.

name: Cat Quest III + The World of Cat Quest Digital Artbook Bundle
description: In Cat Quest III you play as a purrivateer in a freely explorable 2.5D open-world swarming with Pi-rats. You can sail the seas in your ship for treasures galore! But prepare for peril, as the Pirate King aims to hunt you down...

name: Nightmare Side: The Game
description: Indonesian horror game set in Ardan Radio station from Bandung. Don't listen to Nightmare Side alone, or you'll invite the darkness.

name: Knock on the Coffin Lid - Supporter Edition
description: Investigate your own death, find ways to break free from a time loop, chose a hero who will ascend to the throne and rule the Northern gate! The fates of whole nations of the land of Midian depend on your choices.

name: Dungeons 4: The Good, the Bad and the Evil - Deluxe Edition
description: The Absolute Evil and its trusted *cough* servant, the Dark Elf Thalya, return in Dungeons 4 after the events of its fabulous predecessor to bring about their triumph over the forces of good once more.

name: Revue Starlight El Dorado
description: The first console game of the stage-themed multi-media franchise "Revue Starlight" is on its way!

based.credits: CSF ✧GͥOͣDͫ✧ + Crack by ryuugames with GoldBerg

name: SteamWorld Heist II - Deluxe Edition
description: Join Captain Leeway and his ragtag crew as they uncover the enigmatic menace threatening the Great Sea. Equip and upgrade your crew for turn-based gunfights packed with ricochet action and engage in real-time naval combat. Get ready to aim, plot, and plunder in this turn-based tactical adventure.

name: Deathbound
description: Deathbound is a one-of-a-kind party-based soulslike set in a callous world where Faith and Science clash. Dynamically transform between fallen warriors all with their own unique skill sets, combat styles, and rich history. Conquer a brutal reality where Life and Death were never more conflicted.

name: DOOM + DOOM II
description: Developed by id Software, and originally released in 1993 and 1994, the definitive, newly enhanced versions of DOOM + DOOM II are available as a combined product.

name: Dungeons & Degenerate Gamblers
description: Battle your way through a seedy tavern filled with gambling addicted townspeople in this Blackjack Roguelike Adventure. From aces and face cards to tarot cards, business cards and more, create your unique deck to beat the house.

name: Depersonalization
description: Dice! Tabletop role-playing games! Cthulhu! Diverse story modules! Rich branching narratives! We are prisoners of fate, but sometimes we also roll the dice and create miracles!

name: myPOPGOES
notes: Note: Launch steamclient_loader_x32.exe in ''myPOPGOES\'' to play the game.
description: "Of course you'll never get to experience Freddy Fazbear's Pizza like I did. And maybe that's a good thing. But a few months ago, I wondered... What if Popgoes could?"

name: VLADiK BRUTAL
description: Fight under the onslaught of mutated monsters, obsessed soldiers and even darker bosses. Just try to survive and find out what to do next in this life, simultaneously tearing your enemies to pieces.

name: Train Valley World
description: Train Valley World is an engrossing transport tycoon inspired by the genre classics. Build and manage efficient railroads across the globe, create sophisticated logistics chains, design your own levels, and become a business mogul – solo or in multiplayer!

name: Natsu-Mon: 20th Century Summer Kid - Sunset Bundle
description: A circus troupe comes to Yomogi Town, a rural town in Japan situated between mountains and the ocean. As the son of the circus ringmaster, enjoy a special summer filled with adventures! All of Yomogi Town and the nature surrounding it are an open world where you can enjoy summer to its fullest.

name: Bewitching Sinners
description: Bewitching Sinners is a dark comedy dating sim where your choices will either leave you with your true love or ruin a whole world and potentially killing millions of people within it, no pressure! Explore a fantasy world full of witches, hot priests, and the occasional dance with death.

name: Aero GPX
description: Aero GPX is an anti-gravity racer focused on high velocity, flight, machine-to-machine combat, and responsive controls that are easy to pick up but difficult to master. Fight for the best position possible with high speeds, risky maneuvers, and visceral attacks!

name: The Crush House
description: Film and produce 1999's hottest reality TV show: The Crush House! Select a crush-worthy cast, satisfy voracious audiences and keep the show on air to uncover the sinister secrets behind this darkly comic thirst-person shooter.

name: Meowsterpiece Museum
description: Great painters love cats and hid them in their masterpieces. Your mission is to find them and make the paintings even more beautiful.

name: I Wani Hug that Gator!
description: I Wani Hug that Gator! Is a choice-driven narrative about teenagers struggling to find their way. Help Inco, loser highschooler extraordinaire, navigate his budding friendships (and romance!) while surviving being the only human in a dinosaur-filled school.

name: Roots of Pacha + Soundtrack Bundle
notes: Note: GoldBerg Emu with Achievements and Overlay support is applied after extraction, if you need play Online apply the contents in "_CrackOnly (OFME)" folder and open Steam before launch.
description: Be a part of a thriving stone age community. Discover “ideas,” domesticate crops, befriend animals, and contribute to the growth of your village. Play with friends in co-op or explore the early days of civilization in single-player.

name: Mr. Prepper: Custom Game Settings - Anniversary Edition
description: Mr. Prepper is about being prepared. You know something is wrong. The risk of a nuclear war is in the air and you need to get ready for what's coming.
genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation

name: GUILTY GEAR -STRIVE- Blazing Edition
description: The cutting-edge 2D/3D hybrid graphics pioneered in the Guilty Gear series have been raised to the next level in “GUILTY GEAR -STRIVE-“. The new artistic direction and improved character animations will go beyond anything you’ve seen before in a fighting game!

name: Shoulders of Giants: Ultimate
description: Simultaneously control a sword-wielding robot and a gunslinging space frog in Shoulders of Giants, an explosively colourful sci-fi roguelike. Play alone, with a friend, or as part of a four-person team, cutting through waves of enemies on a quest to rescue the galaxy from the forces of Entropy!

name: Nova Drift Game & Soundtrack Bundle
description: Nova Drift distills the mechanical depth and strategy of an ARPG into classic arcade space combat. Control an endlessly evolving bio-mechanical ship, face legions of strange and deadly foes, and ride the wake of a dying star across the void.

name: Operation: Polygon Storm The Train - Deluxe Edition
description: A fastpaced, military tug-of-war game with minimal micromanagement. Choose and deploy from a mix of specialized military units to overwhelm the enemy. Experiment with a huge variety of unit compositions, synergies, abilities, and upgrades to lead your army to victory!

name: Cult of the Lamb: Unholy Alliance + Pilgrim Pack - The One Who Waits Bundle
notes: Other DLCs unlockable, just copy and replace in ''Cult Of The Lamb_Data\Plugins\x86_64\steam_settings\''  ~ Thx to machine4578: https://cs.rin.ru/forum/viewtopic.php?f=10&t=115372&p=3105708&hilit=#p3105708
description: Start your own cult in a land of false prophets, venturing out into diverse and mysterious regions to build a loyal community of woodland Followers and spread your Word to become the one true cult.

name: The Bathhouse - 地獄銭湯 Restored Edition
description: The Bathhouse | 地獄銭湯 Remake is a Japanese horror game that revolves around working at a bathhouse. A complete revamp of the original bathhouse.

name: Violent Horror Stories: anthology
description: 4 short horror games from different authors and in different genres. Each game is an author's vision on the theme of 'pursuit'.

name: Bopp Files
notes: How change language: You can change in the game settings.
description: A game similar to Exit No. 8, it combines spot-the-difference gameplay with room escape elements. Players are trapped in an apartment, the exit of which is blocked by a demon. The player needs to find the key in the looping space within the game to escape the room.

name: X Invader
description: X Invader is an action roguelite where you hack into big corporations' servers. Use add-ons from fellow hackers to defeat monsters. Powerful, cute bosses guard these servers!

name: Tavern Manager Simulator
description: Restore your fantasy tavern to its full glory. Repair, improve and expand the establishment. Cook delicious food and keep an eye on the mood of the visitors. Create a unique atmosphere for unforgettable adventures!

name: Pickup Point Simulator
description: Become an entrepreneur and develop your retail outlet. Order goods and place them in the warehouse, give orders to customers by scanning QR-code, design and expand your premises, hire employees and learn new skills!

name: Sam & Max: The Devil's Playhouse
description: The last game in the episodic Sam & Max trilogy, beautifully remastered! As the intergalactic villains who seek the Devil’s Toybox close in and Max’s psychic abilities grow beyond his control, the Freelance Police will come up against their most frightening adversary yet: the power of Max’s mind.

name: Crime Scene Cleaner
description: Once you get tangled with the mob, you will forever be a part of the mob. At least they pay a decent salary and all you have to do is clean up after their dirty work, but you know what you’re doing. So clean crime scenes, earn as much money as you can, and get ready for the next mission.

name: 墙之恐惧: The Walls Still Stand
description: Step into the eerie Kowloon Walled City in 墙之恐惧: The Walls Still Stand, an indie horror walking simulator. Complete daily tasks, uncover dark secrets, and explore with 3D spatial sound. Think critically to unlock all six endings in this 1-2 hour journey. Can you escape the city's grip?

name: Hidden Through Time 2: Discovery
description: Hidden Through Time 2: Discovery is a cozy hidden object game that has you searching for hidden objects in hand-drawn, interactive landscapes. Ignite your imagination, unleash your inner artist with the editor and share your masterpieces with the world!

name: Late Shift
description: Late Shift is a first-person horror game. Immerse yourself in a realistic thriller and try to escape the death that follows your life as a night shift worker at a gas station.

name: shapez 2 - Supporter Edition
notes: Note: Included two .bat for those who wish to play in DirectX 12 (shapez 2-DX12.bat) or Vulkan (shapez 2-VK.bat).
description: Dive into a factory-building game where the focus is on just that — building huge factories! Construct sprawling multi-level factories and min-max your layouts without limits. Shapez 2 is tailor-made for enthusiasts who crave the thrill of optimizing production lines and perfecting automation.

name: Sins of a Solar Empire II
description: Battle for galactic dominance in this real-time 4X strategy game with unrivaled scale! You’ll explore, expand, exploit, and exterminate through military force, diplomacy, trade, culture, influence, and other underhanded tactics.

name: DREDGE: The Iron Rig - Complete The Set Bundle
description: DREDGE is a single-player fishing adventure with a sinister undercurrent. Sell your catch, upgrade your boat, and dredge the depths for long-buried secrets. Explore a mysterious archipelago and discover why some things are best left forgotten.

name: Intravenous II - Supporter Bundle
description: Intravenous 2 is the ultimate blend of tactical gameplay and immersive storytelling. Will you embrace the shadows or confront your foes head-on? The choice is yours. Experience a new era of tactical stealth action. Save lives. Uncover secrets. Take vengeance.

name: Tales & Tactics
description: Roguelike Squad-based Autobattler in a Tabletop RPG setting. Draft your army, carefully equip and position your units, make important choices, and meet a colorful cast of characters as you make ready for the Grand Tournament.

name: Arco - Soundtrack Bundle
description: Enter the breathtaking world of Arco, a dynamic tactical RPG where your decisions shape the story. Three tales forged in bloodshed, laced with magic, and united by revenge.

name: Just Crow Things
description: You're a little crow trying to prove herself to the world. Make new animal friends, poop on unsuspecting hoomans, and steal all the shiny trinkets! Each level is a little sandbox full of fun items to discover and puzzles to solve, while leaving a bit of chaos behind. Why? Just caws!

name: Phantom Spark - Deluxe Edition
description: Dive into the captivating high-speed world of Phantom Spark. Engage in precision time-trial racing to best the champions in the single-player campaign, challenge your friends in split-screen local multiplayer, or make your mark on the global online leaderboards.

name: Regiments - Winds of Change Bundle
description: Regiments is a Real-Time Tactics game set in Germany 1989. The Cold War has gone hot, and the inferno is raging. Lead your Regiment through the fires of conflict and the fog of war. Break through the lines, call in artillery, maneuver, feign retreats, stage defenses, counter-attack. Do not relent.

name: Love, Ghostie - Soundtrack Bundle
description: Become a wholesome ghost matchmaker and grow relationships between the manor’s residents! Gift items to lift their spirits, set them up on dates, and watch love bloom! Discover cute romances with a unique story between every pair of residents! How will love blossom in your manor?

name: 7th Domain: Tree of Chaos
description: "7th Domain" is a horizontal version action game derived from Roguelike Metroidvania combined with treasure grinding gameplay. You will play a child of destiny who repairs the world and finds the truth of the broken world. You will grow in battle and challenge the unknown and hidden forces.

name: Farewell North
description: Restore color to the desolate islands of Farewell North, an atmospheric journey where you play as a border collie on an adventure with your human. Explore land and sea, uncover hidden paths and free wildlife to bring color back to her world, while revealing an emotional story about saying farewell.

name: Coral Island: Finale Land and Sea - OST Bundle
description: Coral Island is a vibrant and laid-back reimagining of farm sim games. Be who you want and experience enchanting island living at your own pace—live off the land, nurture animals, build relationships with a diverse cast of townsfolk, and make the world around you a more vital and harmonious place.
genres: Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Strategy

name: Yog-Sothoth’s Yard
description: Manage a hotel and hire employees including Death, a dragon, a Demon-Slayer, and a bioroid maid. Build your wealth through various means and refine your strategies based on the predictions of Oracles. Your choices will determine which employees become enamored with you.

name: Artifice: War Tactics
description: Artifice: War Tactics is a turn-based strategy roguelike game with a unique asymmetric combat system. In this game, enemies set up attack zones, while your champions can actively evade and disrupt their strategy using their traits, abilities, or items.

name: Beach Club Simulator 2024
description: Beach Club Simulator is a very comprehensive beach management game. Develop your beach from zero to hero. Increase your earnings, popularity and business acumen. Enjoy the sea, sand and sun!

name: Vampire Survivors - Game + All DLC + OST Bundle
description: Mow down thousands of night creatures and survive until dawn! Vampire Survivors is a gothic horror casual game with rogue-lite elements, where your choices can allow you to quickly snowball against the hundreds of monsters that get thrown at you.

name: ZonZon
description: The main character is a journalist who arrived at a large warehouse to record a documentary about the warehouse operation. But instead, he is faced with a real nightmare. The warehouse turns out to be populated by hungry guards and crazy warehouse operators who turn it into a death trap.
genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Sports, Strategy

name: SNAP SNAP
description: Having collected information about the “unusual corpse” for your journalistic investigation, you return home from the morgue. Something is wrong... The house has changed and there is a creature wandering in it that is afraid of the camera flash. Solve puzzles to get out of the house and survive.

name: Lunar Nightmare
description: Lunar Nightmare is a retro-inspired sci-fi thriller, set on an abandoned Moon base, where you have to solve the mystery behind missing crew members, ancient discoveries around deep down the Lunar surface, rouge-AI trying to control your fate and ghastly androids to revolting against your command.

name: Feed the Deep
description: A lovecraftian roguelite. Dive into procedurally generated undersea caves. Collect gold, upgrade your equipment, and Feed the Deep.

name: Gourdlets - Supporters Edition
description: An easygoing sandbox game about building towns for cute vegetable folks. Create your perfect community then watch as the gourdlets make themselves at home. No objectives, no points, just good vibes. Play in full screen, or let your gourdlets hang out at the bottom of your screen!

name: Planetaries
description: Experience a vast Sci-fi open-world survival TD game set on a distant planet deep in the universe. Craft, build, mine, trade, explore, and survive in this alien world. Collect Data and defend against waves of enemies seeking to banish you. Enjoy the adventure in Singleplayer or Multiplayer.

name: Trouble Comes Twice
description: Play as twins Hazel and Jace in this wholesome romcom visual novel. After a silly bet is made, the protagonists must find a boyfriend or girlfriend before their twin beats them to it!

name: Dead Cells: The End is Near - Medley of Pain Bundle
notes: How to Play: Launch steamclient_loader_x32.exe in ''Dead Cells The End is Near - Medley of Pain Bundle\'' to play the game.
description: Dead Cells is a roguelite, metroidvania inspired, action-platformer. You'll explore a sprawling, ever-changing castle... assuming you’re able to fight your way past its keepers in 2D souls-lite combat. No checkpoints. Kill, die, learn, repeat.

name: Trailmakers: Pedal to the Metal & Motorhead - Ultimate Edition
description: Build the ultimate vehicle and explore a vast open world filled with challenges and adventure. Play solo or team up with friends in multiplayer to conquer the toughest obstacles. With a thrilling campaign mode and endless creative possibilities, Trailmakers is the ultimate sandbox for adventurers.

name: The Gravedigger
description: You're hired to dig up graves at a local church, looting valuables while demonic activity escalates. You must find and return all the burnt bones to stop the demonic activity. Each night you will dig for valuables to find bones, fend off growing corruption, and survive to solve the mystery.

name: Slot Waste
description: An episode-length first-person factory simulation. Navigate through a series of 10 unique and weird mini-games. What are you producing and who are you making it for?

name: NARIBIKIMURA
description: Guided by information from a bulletin board, the protagonist arrives at the uncharted village of Naribiki. With no way to turn back, he must explore the village to find a way out. As he delves deeper into the heart of Naribiki Village, the hidden mysteries of this eerie place slowly come to light...

name: Portobugia - The Eternal Winter
description: Portobugia is a management/survival/inspection game where you manage a port and must supply a city with goods and food. To do so you must unload boats, but, be careful, some of them could be infected! You will also face difficult events, to fight them, you can upgrade, construct and research!

name: In Woods - Poisohell
description: In Woods is a roguelike survival game set in a forest. Fight different monsters, craft items, and defeat the final boss for victory.

name: SurrounDead - Discovery Part 1
description: SurrounDead is an open world survival game. Taking place in a world ravaged by an apocalyptic catastrophe. The dead reign free and will stop at nothing to kill you.

name: Dustborn
description: Ragtag crew? Check. Musical gear? Check. Tour bus and robot driver? Check. Stolen package? Check! Embark on a perilous road-trip across a Divided States of America. Use the power of words to shape relationships with your crew, get out of trouble and reach your final destination.

name: Anomaly Exit
notes: How to play Online: GoldBerg with Achievements and Overlay support is applied after extraction, if you need play Online apply the contents in "_CrackOnly (revCrew)" and open Steam before launch.
description: On your way home on the train, you weren't paying attention. Until you realised the train had been stopping at the same station over, and over again. Watch out for anomalies, and avoid the Anomaly Exit! Made for singleplayer and 2-6 co-operative multiplayer.

name: Ocean Punk - Climactic Battle
description: Explore a fantasy ocean-punk world, braving the deep with steam-powered marvels. Discover mysterious underwater treasures, but scarcity and ecological crises test survival. Rise, build, confront foes in this pixel-art ocean survival journey!

name: Owinka Shooter 2
description: Owinka Shooter 2 throws you right back into the story of Owinka 427. Prepare to escape the Institute once and for all!

name: Just Xiangqi
description: This is a refreshing Chinese chess game with realistic graphics and a detailed audio tutorial that will keep you entertained, even as a novice. A variety of well-designed challenges will test your tactics. Sit back and relax, as you transform into a master of strategy.
Embark on a journey of Zen koans in a Buddhist mandala space Reach Nirvana with a 1 in 8192 chance in a mystical world adorned with tombstones and Buddha statues.

name: Sunset Hills
description: After being discharged from the army and starting to write novels, Nico embarks on a trip to the world with the roar of a train, encountering all kinds of people and events on the way, and experiencing the new world after the war, and the real purpose of Nico's trip gradually emerges ......

name: Dicefolk: Will Chimeras - Master Summoner Bundle
description: Wield magical dice and build a team of powerful Chimeras to stop a mysterious evil in this tactical roguelite adventure. As a Chimera Summoner, recruit and create your perfect team of mythical beasts and command them to victory using unique dice mechanics.

name: Tales of Kenzera™: ZAU
description: Wield the dance of the shaman. Reclaim your father’s spirit. Brave the beautiful and treacherous land of Kenzera with the God of Death in Tales of Kenzera™: ZAU, a metroidvania-style adventure crafted by Surgent Studios.

name: My Lovely Empress
description: My Lovely Empress is an empire management sim inspired by Asian mythology. As the Emperor of the Crimson Empire, you will build relations with neighboring rulers, balance internal factions, and ensure the prosperity of your people, all before you reap their souls to resurrect your beloved empress.

name: KONOSUBA - God's Blessing on this Wonderful World!
description: It's time for a Visual Novel Quest with a twist! Join Kazuma, a reincarnated adventurer, and spend turbulent days with his unfortunate party members. Prepare for waifus, dress-up and resource management and get ready for an Isekai comedy that’s out of this world!

name: Lunar Glow Stellar Dance
notes: How to change language: You can do this by clicking the last selectable option in the Main Menu.
description: "Lunar Glow Stellar Dance" is a love-themed game for all ages, produced by the Chinese girl game brand JROCKSTUDIO.The protagonist, able to see ghosts since childhood, is drawn into non-ordinary events, where he encounters five adorable girls. All mysteries will gradually be unveiled.

name: Escape From Warehouse
description: The journalist goes to the warehouse to record a documentary, but becomes a witness to creepy stories. The guards and warehouse workers look very strange. What is really hidden behind the endless shelves and how not to become a victim of the warehouse?
genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Sports, Strategy

name: Who is Abby
description: A suspenseful psychological thriller, you must unravel a mystery through exploration and puzzle-solving. Become Tom on the search for his missing sister Abby and discover the truth behind her disappearance.

name: Mika and The Witch's Mountain - Soundtrack Bundle
description: Mika and the Witch’s Mountain is a fantasy adventure about an aspiring witch who delivers packages to the townspeople of a small island. Explore every cranny and soar through the sky with your magic broom.

name: Wild West Dynasty - Supporter Edition
description: Conquer the Wild West. Explore the open world of a fictitious American Midwest and survive the harsh environment. Convince other settlers to join you and manage your ever-growing settlements. Build a home, take care of your farm and become a legend in Wild West Dynasty.

name: Tactical Breach Wizards
description: In Tactical Breach Wizards, you lead a team of renegade wizards in kevlar through turn-based battles to unravel a modern conspiracy plot. Combine their unique spells in clever ways, or rewind time to try every crazy plan you can think of to punch a Traffic Warlock through a 4th story window.

name: 3 Minutes to Midnight® - A Comedy Graphic Adventure
description: In a race against time, Betty embarks on a thrilling, comedy-packed adventure to crack a conspiracy that starts with a bang and ends at 3 Minutes to Midnight.

name: Veiled Skies
description: Step into a world above the clouds, into a cloudpunk fantasy with foxgirls!

name: Suzukuri Dungeon - Karin in the Mountain
description: The diabolical demon queen Karin has risen—and you’re in charge of the dungeon she calls home! Expand your budding labyrinth, train monsters to defend it, and build amenities to shake intruders down for cash before you send them packing!

name: Office Fight
description: You’ve been unfairly laid off by Mega Corp and the news kills you. Literally. As a vengeful spirit, use your ghostly power to fling cups, chairs and tables at your co-workers all in the name of revenge. Start fights and watch the destruction unfold in this casual physics-based destruction game.

name: Can't Revert
description: Can't revert is a first-person psychological horror game. You repeatedly find yourself in a house where your wife and son are dead. Discover hidden clues in the house and uncover the secrets of their deaths. Experience the constant tension and fear in the repetitive space.

name: Yohane the Parhelion: NUMAZU in the MIRAGE - Riko & Mari + Yohane
description: Yohane the Parhelion is an official spin-off of "Love Live! Sunshine". 『Yohane the Parhelion - NUMAZU in the MIRAGE -』 is a deckbuilding roguelite set in that world! A mysterious mirror world that changes each time it's entered. After countless choices, Yohane chooses...

name: HELLCARD - Bruja, the Blood Witch
notes: How to play Online: GoldBerg with Achievements, Stats and Overlay support is applied after extraction, if you need play Online apply the contents in "_CrackOnly (OFME)" and open Steam before launch.
subName: Portable V1.1.240821 + Build 15449149 + DLCs Included & Online Supported
description: Hellcard is a unique cooperative deck builder rogue-like game. Descend into the paper dungeons on your own, recruit computer-controlled companions or join other players' lobbies in fast-paced tactical card battles against the armies of darkness and the Archdemon himself!

name: DeepWeb Simulator
description: DeepWeb Simulator is a simulation game where you will get lost in the dark corridors and experience the thrill of illegal trade. Place ads, make secret deals and build your criminal empire in the illegal world of the deep web.

name: Dawn of Defiance
notes: Note: Need an Epic Games account for proper operation.
subName: Portable V134475 -  QOL Patch + Build 15443233 & Online Supported
description: You are the Defier, subjected to a mythic plot across ruined isles. In this Greek myth-inspired survival craft, ascend from weak soldier to god-like anti-hero. Build impressive Greek structures, craft and upgrade your gear, and face down the trials of Gods with up to 3 friends.

name: Fran Bow - Remastered
description: Fran Bow is a creepy adventure game that tells the story of Fran, a young girl struggling with a mental disorder and an unfair destiny.

name: Sengoku Dynasty: Ikigai - Ultimate Edition
description: Build and manage villages in an open-world feudal Japan. Survive, explore, meet unique characters, and establish your legacy. Play solo or in co-op multiplayer.

name: Galaxy Burger
notes: ⬐ How to play Online: Download and apply the Fix ↴ https://cs.rin.ru/forum/viewtopic.php?f=10&t=142841&p=3112640&hilit=#p3112640 and open Steam before launch. Thx to Kirigiri!
subName: Portable V1.0.0 – HotFix + Build 15481250 & Online Supported
description: Relaxing cooking simulator, NO stress! Cook burgers for mecha cats and aliens. Play with friends up to 8 players or solo.

name: Transformative Summer: Life with a TS Companion
description: During the university summer break, I was wondering how to spend my time with no particular plans when my roommate Akira becomes a girl due to TS syndrome! If she climaxes 100 times within 30 days of TS syndrome, her gender will become fixed!? A debauched summer life with a sudden girl begins...

name: Wander Hero 2024
description: This is the fantasy of a two-dimensional traverser in a different world. You can take a leisurely and strategically deep adventure. You can also collect beautiful girls without hurting your wallet, and form your own harem... ahem, mercenary group.

name: Tunnel Escape
description: Embark on a daring journey with Beatrice as you kick, shoot, and loot through a secret underground lab. In this rogue-lite RPG/ADV, engage in strategic combat and face intense encounters that may strip her bare... of her defenses and expose her to unspeakable dangers!

name: Selene's Unbearable Night
description: A third person survival horror game. Search for key objects, solve puzzles and face dangers in order to escape. Inspired by the old survival horror, with two playable characters and modern mechanics delve into the narrative story of Selene's Unbearable night.

name: Remnants of the Macabre
description: Navigate 1980s Japan as a schoolgirl in this Junji Ito-inspired horror game. Each choice shapes your fate, leading to safety or deeper into the macabre. Uncover hidden horrors in an urban street filled with sinister details. Will you find your way home, or be consumed by the unknown?

name: Terra Nil: Vita Nova - Deluxe Edition
subName: Portable V1.1.7 - HotFix 1 + Build 15470202 & DLCs Included
description: Terra Nil is an intricate environmental strategy game about transforming a barren wasteland into a thriving, balanced ecosystem. Bring life back to a lifeless world by purifying soil, cleaning oceans, planting trees, and reintroducing wildlife, then leave without a trace.

name: Landlord's Super
description: Your quintessential construction simulator is here. Take a dodgy loan, restore a property, move in the locals, attend to their grievances, then celebrate with a pint in this fully-simulated, open-world 1980's Britain.

name: Liminal Void
description: This is a horror dungeon crawler where you snatch souls, cast spells, and die repeatedly. Select from 4 colorful characters and occasionally listen to them yap about their problems. It's very "mood."

name: Lord of Rigel
description: Lord of Rigel is a turn-based 4X space strategy game inspired by the classics. In a galaxy divided by two elder races, will you unite with other species or forge your own path? Navigate galactic politics and defeat threats using espionage, research, and military force. How will you shape the galaxy?

name: Roundscape Adorevia
description: Roundscape Adorevia is a turn-based 2D adult RPG filled with extensive content, exotic companions, and dozens of story choices. Select your gender, origin, class, and companions to explore the lewd fantasy world of Adorevia.

name: Love is in small things
notes: Bypass Stuck Intro: Launch Save_Folder.bat (Create the save folder for you automatically), which is necessary to play otherwise you will get stuck in the intro.
